condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Data to assess programme performance, children’s rights and the status of the Sustainable Development Goals relating to children is produced and disseminated.

description.narrative: As planned in the costed evaluation plan, Burkina Faso and Cameroon Country Offices are implementing the multi-country evaluation on Programmes achievements in the area of child protection. The evaluation is managed by the Regional Office. To date, the methodology and inception report are approved. Collection of primary sources data has been constrained by the COVID-19 pandemic. Alternative innovative options have been considered and implemented. Efforts and interventions planned to revamp sector information systems and other data collection mechanisms couldn't be completed in the field because of impact of COVID-19 control measures. U-Report was used to collect data on COVID-19 response. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/06/2020

The national MIS produces age-disagregated data on HIV for all districts on a quaterly basis
